TopicTitle: Sudden uncontrolled spinning when dropping out of time warp [Retracting Landing Legs During Timewarp Causes Rotation When Stopping Timewarp]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel i7 -13700K | GPU: Nvidia 3080ti | RAM: DDR5 32gb

 

1. After landed on Mun, launched and Started time acceleration with landing legs extended (medium size)

2. With time accelerated, collapsed landing legs

3. Dropped out of time warp and vehicles starts spinning uncontrollably and legs look extended again

How I recovered

1. Paused and toggled legs again
